info.name: FastBus API
info.description:
Complete API collection for FastBus - Bus/Train Ticket Booking System

Generated on: 2025-11-26T09:25:44.166869+00:00Z

‚ö†Ô∏è **IMPORTANT**: This collection includes demo/mock payment endpoints. No real financial transactions are processed.

## Setup Instructions

1. Set the `base_url` variable to your API URL (e.g., http://localhost:5000)
2. Sign up or login to get an access token
3. The access token will be automatically available as `{{access_token}}`
4. For admin endpoints, login with an admin account

## Authentication

Most endpoints require a JWT token in the Authorization header:
`Authorization: Bearer {{access_token}}`

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Role Options:**
- `customer` (default)
- `admin`

Login with email/username and password.

You can use either `email` or `username` field.

Get a new access token using refresh token.

Change Authorization header to use `{{refresh_token}}`
Get currently authenticated user information
Verify if the current token is valid
Logout (client should delete stored tokens)
Get current user profile information
Update user profile (full update). Only provided fields will be updated.
Partially update user profile. Only provided fields will be updated.
Change user password. Requires current password verification.
Update user first and last name
Search for available trips
Get detailed trip information including available seats
Get available seats for a specific trip
Calculate fare for selected trip and seats with optional promo code
Get all currently active promo codes
Get details of a specific promo code
Validate a promo code for current user
Create a new booking for a trip
Get all bookings for current user
Get details of a specific booking
Get booking details by booking reference code
Cancel a booking and free up seats
Update payment status for a booking

item.name: üí≥ Payments (DEMO)
item.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è **MOCK PAYMENT SYSTEM** - No real money is processed!

These endpoints simulate payment processing for testing purposes.

request.description: Get available payment methods (DEMO)
Get available test scenarios for payment simulation
‚ö†Ô∏è DEMO: Initiate a payment with credit card
‚ö†Ô∏è DEMO: Initiate a payment with UPI

‚ö†Ô∏è DEMO: Process/complete a payment transaction

Use `test_scenario` to simulate different outcomes:
- success
- insufficient_funds
- invalid_card
- network_error
- timeout
- declined
Get payment transaction status
Get all payment attempts for a booking
Get payment history for current user
‚ö†Ô∏è DEMO: Request a refund for a successful payment

item.name: üîß Admin - Trips

request.description: **Admin Only:** Create a new trip

body.raw:
{
  "trip_number": "TRK001",
  "origin": "New York",
  "destination": "Boston",
  "departure_time": "2025-12-03T09:25:44.166823+00:00Z",

  "base_fare": 49.99,
  "total_seats": 50,
  "operator_name": "Express Transit",
  "vehicle_type": "Luxury Coach",
  "amenities": "WiFi, AC, Reclining Seats"
}
